column1: Soe (sometimes seen as SoE) is the capital of the South Central Timor Regency
column2: East Nusa Tenggara province of Indonesia. Soe is located on Timor Island.

column1: It was heavily bombed in 1944 during the second world war Water supplies for the locality have been a problem for a considerable time
column2: despite aid to assist with dams and other means of finding water The city has about 27
column3: 700 inhabitants (2004). The elevation here is about 800 m.Soe can be a base for tourists for trips to other locations. Oinlasi
column5: Niki Niki and Kapan are reachable from Soe.

column1: It is on the route (via Kapan) to the highest mountain in West Timor Mount Mutis.
